text: â€œChifukwa cha chifundo chochokera kwa Allah, uli woleza mtima kwa iwo, (iwe Mtumiki Muhammad {s.a.w}). Ndipo ukadakhala waukali, wouma mtima, ndithudi, akadakuthawa pamaso pako. Choncho akhululukire ndi kuwapemphera chikhululuko (kwa Allah); ndipo chita nawo upo pa zinthu. Ndipo ngati watsimikiza, tsamira kwa Allah (basi, ndi kuchita chimene watsimikiza kuchichita). Ndithudi, Allah amakonda oyadzamira Kwake (odalira Iye)
